pages.text: Crafting these farms is simple.You need 9 Glass Panes, a shovel and the rock that you want it to generate For example, the Sand Farm is created with 9 Glass Panes on the outside, any level of Shovel in the Middle and Sand below that. Just like in Regular Gameplay, the kind of Shovel determines the "Mineing Speed"$(br)Please note that at the moment Modded Shovels do work, but they will default to a Wooden Mining speed and you will be unable to upgrade them. As such, it's suggested to stick to vanilla Shovels. Support for Modded Shovels is a work in progress.
